description: Two suspects are arrested after the incident near the scene of the deadly 2015 attack on the magazine.
title: Paris attack: Two people stabbed near former Charlie Hebdo office
title_page: Paris attack: Two people stabbed near former Charlie Hebdo office - BBC News
maintext: "Two colleagues were smoking a cigarette outside the building, in the street. I heard shouting. I went to the window and saw one of my colleagues, covered in blood, being chased by a man with a machete in the street," another member of staff at the Premi¨¨res Lignes production firm said.
